perturbation.original_text: For the purposes of this Agreement, "Distribution Channels" means the distribution of the Licensed Products through GNC retail and online chains worldwide during the First Contract Year and, thereafter, through MusclePharm's other worldwide distribution channels, as mutually determined by MusclePharm and the AS Parties.
perturbation.changed_text: For the purposes of this Agreement, "Distribution Channels" means the distribution of the Licensed Products through GNC retail and online chains worldwide during the First Contract Year. Thereafter, MusclePharm may, at its sole discretion, utilize any distribution channels it deems appropriate for the Licensed Products.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Distribution Channels' requires mutual agreement for channel changes after the first year. The modified version gives MusclePharm sole discretion, creating a contradiction if other sections require AS Parties' consent for distribution methods.

perturbation.original_text: MusclePharm shall utilize its commercially reasonable efforts to advertise and promote the Licensed Products at its own expense and to sell the Licensed Products through the Distribution Channels worldwide as contemplated herein during the Term and to promote both the goodwill of the Endorser and the market reputation of the Licensed Products. MusclePharm will conduct its activities relating to the marketing of the Licensed Products in a professional manner. In that connection:
perturbation.changed_text: MusclePharm shall have the option, but not the obligation, to advertise and promote the Licensed Products and to sell the Licensed Products through the Distribution Channels worldwide during the Term. MusclePharm will conduct its activities relating to the marketing of the Licensed Products in a manner it deems appropriate. In that connection:
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that MusclePharm 'shall utilize commercially reasonable efforts' for marketing. The modified text says MusclePharm 'shall have the option,' creating a contradiction regarding MusclePharm's marketing obligations. Is marketing required or optional?

perturbation.original_text: MusclePharm agrees that its use of the Trademarks and Name and Appearance Rights shall inure to the benefit of the AS Parties and that MusclePharm shall not, at any time, acquire any rights in the Trademarks and/or Name and Appearance Rights by virtue of any use it may make of the Trademarks and/or Name and Appearance Rights.
perturbation.changed_text: MusclePharm agrees that its use of the Trademarks and Name and Appearance Rights shall inure to the benefit of the AS Parties. To the extent MusclePharm creates derivative works based on the Trademarks, MusclePharm will own those derivatives.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states MusclePharm acquires no rights. The modified text states they can own derivatives, creating a contradiction regarding ownership of intellectual property based on the Trademarks.
